mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL VALUES(SEQ_APP.NEXTVAL, SEQ_DOC.CURRVAL, #{memNum}, #{appLevel}, NULL, #{appStatus}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT LEAVE_LEFT FROM APP_DOC WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memberNum} AND FORM_NO = 3 AND LEAVE_TYPE IN('연차', '반차') AND SUBSTR(DOC_DATE, 1, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND DOC_STATUS != '임시' ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DOC_DATE, FORM_NAME, DOC_TITLE, DOC_NO, DOC_STATUS FROM APP_DOC JOIN APP_FORM ON APP_FORM.FORM_NO = APP_DOC.FORM_NO WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum}
AND DOC_STATUS = '${docStatus}'
AND DOC_STATUS != '임시'
ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC

SELECT DOC_DATE, FORM_NAME, DOC_TITLE, DOC_NO, DOC_STATUS FROM APP_DOC JOIN APP_FORM ON APP_FORM.FORM_NO = APP_DOC.FORM_NO WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memberNum} AND DOC_STATUS != '임시'
AND DOC_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND FORM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DOC_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND (DOC_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DOC_DATE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR FORM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')
ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC
